text: @realDonaldTrump @seanhannity @FoxNews By the way.  A lot of us who watched the Tulsa rally were sitting with a bingo card to capture your rhetoric.  I will not watch your ridiculous lies and rhetoric.  Remember covid19 and the racial divide you have stocked for years.
